Class ServiceConstants

java.lang.Object
org.jscience.server.constants.ServiceConstants
public final class ServiceConstants extends Object
Service-related constants for JScience Server. This class contains constants for: - mDNS service discovery - Service identifiers - Protocol definitions
Since:
1.0
Author:
Silvere Martin-Michiellot, Gemini AI (Google DeepMind)
